name: Procedural Generation Showcase
description:
A project I worked on for a procedural generation class that showcases a terrain with hills and some other defining features such as underwater areas you can swim in, coral that shows underwater, a lighthouse that lights up the area and fire flies that show up at night.

Included is also the source code for the project that I used so that it can be studied better.

Controls: 

WASD- Move (Up/Left/Back/Right) respectively.

Move the mouse around to look around.

Space- Jump
